definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: If you bought this tea-set in Oxford Street, it would cost you ￡14 at least!
sentences.chinese: 如果你在牛津街買這套茶具，你至少得化14英鎊。

sentences.english: Bedding was strewn on the floor and dirty teacups stacked in a corner.
sentences.chinese: 寢具散在地板上，髒兮兮的茶具塞在角落裏。

sentences.english: It's a set of Yixing purple clay teapots.
2：Okay, Sally, you get mother's Chinese tea set.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，莎莉，你就拿媽媽的中國茶具吧。

sentences.english: How are you going to pack these block of tea sets?
sentences.chinese: 這批茶具你們打算怎樣包裝？

sentences.english: The __tea art performances_ show how to make a perfect cup of tea with beautiful tea sets.
sentences.chinese: 茶藝表演展示了用漂亮的茶具沏一杯極好的茶的方法。

sentences.english: In addition, the multifunctional combined tea set can prevent tea cups from falling down and can be used as compote.
sentences.chinese: 另外，本茶具還可防止茶杯摔落，並能兼作果盤使用。

sentences.english: Escherichia coli was checked out in part of tea sets and beddings .
sentences.chinese: 部分茶具上和臥具上檢出大腸桿菌。

sentences.english: This tea culture places emphasis on the taste and color of the tea as well as on the presentation of the tea set.
sentences.chinese: 這種茶文化注重茶的味與色，以及茶具的擺放。

sentences.english: Besides, maybe you can help me choose one set for my grandpa.
sentences.chinese: 而且，也許你可以幫我爲我爺爺挑選一套茶具。

sentences.english: A tea set made of sugar.
sentences.chinese: 這套茶具是以砂糖爲原料做成的。

sentences.english: First, you must guarantee the use of water, tea, hot third.
sentences.chinese: 首先，必須嚴把用水，茶具，沖泡三道關。

sentences.english: This tea set was made in Jingdezhen, the famous capital of porcelain.
sentences.chinese: 這套茶具產於瓷都景德鎮。

sentences.english: He bought the samovar as is from an antique dealer.
sentences.chinese: 他原封不動地從古董商那裏買到這套俄國式茶具。

definition: tea prepared in large quantity using inexpensive tea leaves
very concentrated type of tea drunk in Chaozhou, Fujian and Taiwan
water pot or goblet (for Chinese calligraphy)
